ygData.subject: The dawning of a new era...

	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Stronghold and Blender hear something and turn around. There is nothing the=
re. They turn and keep on walking. Bam, Whap, swiiiing! Stronghold and Blen=
der are hanging upside down from a tree. Blender pulls out his saw blade an=
d cuts them loose. They fall into the ground in a pit trap. They can't even=
 reach the top with Blender on Stronghold's shoulders. Plintissa and Artist=
 come over and press a button. Stronghold fires but the shot is reflected a=
nd hits Blender. Apparently, Dracona made quite some good devices that Plin=
tissa is still using.

"Now that we have them, my old friend will come and =
then we take her, too!" Plintissa said. Artist was worried about this, but =
he was confident that Plintissa would succeed.

Dracona makes it back to th=
e base. She sees Stronghold and Blender in a hole in the ground. Dracona la=
ughs and lets them out. Blender and Stronghold explain to Dracona what happ=
ened. Plintissa steps out from behind a tree.

"So how about it Dracona, me=
 and you, one on one, unless your scared, of course." Plintissa said. Draco=
na motioned for Stronghold and Blender to step back and let her handle this=
. Dracona facd Plintissa face to face.

"I thought you were my friend Draco=
na, you showed true compassion!" Plintissa said.

"It was compassion all ri=
ght, but it was an act!"

"Artist told me some of the things you said, thos=
e things weren't evil."

"Suukie should keep his mouth shut before someone =
busts his rhyming ass back to Cybertron!"

"You were always so caring, why =
did you do this? Were you really reprogrammed?"

"No, Sinesis and Sinister'=
s invention was trash, it didn't work, it was an act, just like how the Rad=
icons were acting! And how I was acting that I was your friend!"

"But why =
would you do something like that?"

"I was hoping to get in good with the M=
aximals to get back to Cybertron a hero, then turn of everyone and kill all=
 of the Maximals and Predacons in the name of the Alliance!"

"But the Alli=
ance dumped you!"

"Yes, I wanted to kill them, too!"

"But Dracona, why di=
d you pretend you were my friend?"

"I thought you were in good with the bo=
ss, how unintelligent and out of character I was to think that, but after I=
 learned that the boss hated you, I just put on the act with giving the Max=
imals weapons so I could be the one in good with the pathetic boss!"

"I do=
n't understand, you were always so good!"

"Are you braindead? I LIED to yo=
ur ass and everyone elses! And that includes Team Ultima, I lied to them as=
 well! You may not know, because you weren't around, but I had a lab underg=
round, and I almost killed that little punk Gangon, I even took on the lead=
er of the Alliance, everything Dracona did was for Dracona!"

Plintissa cri=
ed some when she realized that the same thing that had happened in the past=
 had happened again, as udual, people used her and then dumped her. Plintis=
sa remembered her only real friend, Iron Raptor. Artist was not her friend,=
 he was her lover. But Plintissa could go on life with just Artist just fin=
e. Plintissa remembered what had happened when she first came, she found Ar=
tist's pod, and made friends with Iron Raptor. And Later, Iron Raptor didn'=
t pay any attention to anything she said, all because Liono didn't like her=
, how unfair. But it was part of life, life is unfair. Plintissa remembered=
 her sorrow when Artist could not remember her, Dracona was the only one be=
hind her.

"I remember when you were my only friend, Dracona." Plintissa sa=
id.

"Are you kidding? When that idiot Suukie ran off to fight the Preds, I=
 was the one who told him to do it alone and not let anyone interfere, and =
he did it because I told him to, he thought I was your friend too! Everyone=
 was lied to! Suukie died the first time because I couldn't do anything? I =
killed him you idiot! Sinister and Sinesis, those boneheads didn't do it, b=
ecause I could have save dhim, and now he's back, yippee! Hurray! Wow-O!" D=
racona said.

"And I suppose you did the same thing to Lightmare and Gangon=
, too? They are both dead now, aren't they?" Plintissa asked.

"Well, I ass=
ume they must be, I KICKED, them out of the base, and they got killed, so w=
hat else culd it be? Prepare yourself Plintissa, this fight will be to the =
death!" Dracona said...
